Name: Cave Nightmare
About the game: In search of adventure and gold, the young adventurer descends into abandoned mines and finds an incredible amount of gold, but along with it, he finds something terrible that haunts him, while torches, the only source of light, is dying out so quickly. Cave Nightmare - A top-down horror game where the player, avoiding encounters with monsters, must collect all the gold on the level in order to open the passage to the next level. Features of the game: - Scary Atmosphere - Nice Visual Style - Music
